description: Erection of single storey side/rear extension
decision_conditions: By reason of its scale and depth, the proposed single storey rear/side extension, would adversely impact the amenities of the neighbouring property at no. 20 Selwyn Road, by reason of an unacceptable overbearing impact, increase in the sense of enclosure and loss of outlook to the adjoining property at no. 20 Selwyn Road. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of its scale and depth, the proposed single storey rear/side extension, would adversely impact the amenities of the neighbouring property at no. 20 Selwyn Road, by reason of the loss of daylight and direct sunlight to the adjoining property at no. 20 Selwyn Road. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The porch extension would not relate well to the host property and appear as an incongrous addition within the streetscene. The proposal would have an unacceptable impact on the character and appearance of the host building and streetscene, contrary to to the Council's Residential Design SPD, Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.
